h2_title: Where to use Mind Cores in Black Myth: Wukong
content: You will have to complete some tasks before being able to access his upgrades. This includes finding him in the path through the cave in Sandgate Village \- Village Entrance and defeating Lang-Li-Guhh-Baw in the pit beneath him.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Mind_Core.md', within the main section titled 'Mind Core', specifically from the subsection 'Where to use Mind Cores in Black Myth: Wukong'.
The content is as follows:
You will have to complete some tasks before being able to access his upgrades. This includes finding him in the path through the cave in Sandgate Village \- Village Entrance and defeating Lang-Li-Guhh-Baw in the pit beneath him.
